data.title: A Complete Timeline of Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker‚Äôs Relationship
data.meta_description: Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker have been married since May 2022. Learn more about their relationship here.
data.text:
Do you remember where you were when you found out your fave Blink-182 member Travis Barker and Kourtney Kardashian were rumored to be dating?? Same. At first, there was shock and disbelief. But after multiple outlets reported that Travis and Kourtney had been longtime friends (aaaaand the fact that they‚Äôre legit married and absolutely THIRIVING now), their relationship seems truly meant to be!

We‚Äôve compiled all the details of their ‚Äôship through FBI-levels of snooping for your pleasure, so read it and weep, below.

Editor‚Äôs note: This timeline is in reverse chronological order, meaning that the newest and juiciest updates are at the tippy-top. Happy scrolling!

July 6, 2024

The couple takes part in Travis's inaugural Run Travis Run 5K event in Inglewood only eight months (!!!!) after Kourtney gave birth to their first bb together. "My wife‚Äôs a beast!" Travis gushes to Page Six about the feat. "She‚Äôs never done this. She thinks I‚Äôm crazy because some mornings I‚Äôll wake up and she‚Äôll be like, ‚ÄòWhere are you going?‚Äô I‚Äôm like, ‚ÄòI heard there‚Äôs a 5K, babe, I‚Äôm gonna run it.‚Äô"

July 2, 2024

June 16, 2024

Kourtney posts the sweetest tribute to Travis in honor of Father's Day:

May 30, 2025

The May 30 episode of The Kardashians sees Khlo√© visiting Kourtney while her oldest sister is on bedrest during her third trimester. "Did you see my blood vial in there?" the Poosh founder asks Khlo√©, who replies, "What? No."

"Gotta see the blood," she adds as she looks at items spread out on a table for the second time. "It's a real thing of blood?" the Good American founder asks in disbelief once she finds it. "What was the point?"

"Just to, like, have each other's," Kourt replies.

In a later confessional, Khlo√© muses, "To want to show off your blood vials is also like, alright, if that's what you're into. But it's very, like, Billy Bob Thornton of them. In my every minute of the day, do I want to be like, harnessing a tube of blood? Not for me."

Honestly living for this exchange. üòÇ

May 23, 2024

During the season 5 premiere episode of The Kardashians, Kourt reveals she contracted COVID from Travis during her pregnancy after the two returned home from touring Europe with Blink-182 and made out "for six hours" (the musician had taken a test and got a negative result beforehand).

It was then that the reality star noticed Travis was "hot. Like, his head feels very warm."

"Not a making-out type of warm. Like really warm," the Poosh founder recalls, adding that her husband took a second COVID test and discovered he was positive. And thanks to "that first six hours of just making out, I got COVID," says Kourtney, who then adds that the news came on the morning of her Disney Land-themed baby shower.

They ultimately didn't call the event off, because according to Kris Jenner, "The shower starts in 20 minutes, right? So I think it's crazy to call 50 guests or 100 people and go, don't come. With all this beautiful food and everything going on here that you guys have worked for two days putting it together, I think everybody who comes by has breakfast. Some things, you just don't have any control of, and the most important thing today is Kourtney's health and making sure her and the baby are OK."

A refresher that Kourtney and Travis welcomed their son Rocky in November 2023. So happy for them!

April 20, 2024

A source dishes to People that Travis treats Kourtney "like a queen" and that the Poosh founder has found "much more of an inner peace" since they began their relationship.

"She enjoys a lot of family time and work very much comes second," the insider notes before adding, "She seems calmer, much happier, and content with life. Travis is amazing. He treats Kourtney like a queen. They talk about growing old together‚Äîit‚Äôs very cute!"

Love their love!

April 19, 2024

In honor of Kourt's milestone 45th birthday, Travis pens a touching Instagram tribute that reads, "Happy Birthday to my beautiful wife, soulmate and best friend forever. I love you, I love our life together. Thank you for being the most amazing wife a person could ask for. Here‚Äôs to many more years of adventures together ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•."

March 24, 2024

Kourtney takes to Instagram to post a series of loved-up pics of herself and Travis. Ahem:

February 27, 2024

The celebs‚Äîwho btw are in Australia while Travis is on tour with Blink-182‚Äîshare a buncha snaps from the National Gallery of Victoria in Melbourne.

Personally obsessed with this "iykyk" one shared by Kourt:

But our absolute fave pic is one the reality star shares of herself and Travis resting their heads on each other as they look up at a neon sign that reads, "You put your hand across my mouth but still the noise continues. Every part of my body is screaming smashed into a thousand million pieces each part for ever belonging to you."

We're not crying you, you are!

February 14, 2024

The musician posts a v Kravis-coded Valentine's Day carousel. Ahem:

January 18, 2024

"Rocky's parents" is an iconic caption, just saying:

January 15, 2024

Kravis make their first post-baby red carpet appearance, and yep: they're back at it with the PDA:

December 22, 2023

Kourt and Travis share the first pics of Rocky and he is soooo cute:

December 14, 2023

A source tells Entertainment Tonight that "Kourtney and Travis are over the moon and could not be more elated that they share a child of their own together. Kourtney and Travis already had an unbreakable bond, but having a baby together has brought them even closer and made them fall even more in love. This experience has solidified their feelings that they were destined to be together."

November 5, 2023

According to People, sources say that Kravis‚Äôs baby has officially been born (specifically on November 1)! However, neither Kourtney or Travis publicly announce Baby Barker‚Äôs arrival.

October 31, 2023

During an appearance on the One Life One Chance podcast, Travis dished on Baby Barker‚Äôs name and due date. Travis revealed that the baby‚Äôs name is Rocky Thirteen and that his due date is ‚Äúeither Halloween or, like, the first week of November.‚Äù Obsessed with Kravis keeping the crazy celeb baby name train running.

August 2, 2023

Kravis is clearly still thriving, and we‚Äôre living for every moment. On August 2, the couple seemingly took a trip to their stomping grounds in Santa Barbara‚Äîaka where they got engaged in 2021.

Kourt wished her followers a ‚Äúgood morning‚Äù on her Instagram Stories before posting a series of stunning footage from her romantic getaway with Travis. The clips included a pan of the oceanfront view and a shot of the couple basking in the California sun. Per E! News, she also posted gorgeous views of the moon hanging above the ocean, the sandy beach, and a pink vintage car in front of some palm trees. Travis also posted a peaceful video of the night sky during their dreamy vacay.

June 17, 2023

Travis and Kourtney reveal they are expecting their first child together!!!!!!

A source later tells Entertainment Tonight, ‚ÄúKourtney and Travis are on cloud nine. This pregnancy is beyond Kourtney‚Äôs wildest dreams. Kourtney and Travis feel like this is one of the most magical things to happen to them and a complete miracle. They are so thrilled and can‚Äôt wait to experience this pregnancy together, bring a baby into the world as a unit, and expand and grow their families.‚Äù

April 13, 2023

Kourt and Travis share an intimate, behind-the-scenes look at their weddings in the Hulu special . During one moment, we even get an inside look at the night the two got married in Vegas. Turns out, the Elvis impersonator who officiated the wedding messed up Kourtney‚Äôs name and told Travis to say, ‚ÄúI, Travis, take you, Khlo√©, to be my wife.‚Äù In response, Kourtney fell to the ground and laughed, saying, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm gonna cry. Wait, we need to FaceTime Khlo√©, we need to FaceTime her. She‚Äôs gonna literally die.‚Äù

The couple also open up about their wedding in Italy, including how mom Kris Jenner gave Kourtney her wedding ring from late husband Robert Kardashian. ‚ÄúWhen my dad died, I remember thinking I never want to get married because my dad isn‚Äôt there to walk me down the aisle,‚Äù the eldest Kardashian explains. ‚ÄúSo that gift meant so much.‚Äù I‚Äôm not crying, you are!

April 4, 2023

The duo celebrate the first anniversary of the time they did that whole wedding in Vegas thing right after they attended the 2022 Grammy Awards and had ‚Äútoo much tequila,‚Äù according to the reality star.

‚ÄúIt was one of the best nights of our lives, dreaming of a lifetime filled with fun adventures together. And yes, that‚Äôs me about to throw up on the floor in the car,‚Äù reads the caption in part.

In the comments, the drummer responds and writes, ‚ÄúKourtney you‚Äôre my hunk a hunk burning love. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•‚Äù S‚Äôcute!

February 14, 2023

Trav marks his first Valentine‚Äôs Day married to Kourt by sharing the sweetest carousel of photos of himself and the reality star on Instagram. Just some of the moments included in the post? The two of them posing in front of picturesque mountains, lounging around, and a bed full of rose petals in the shape of a heart. ‚ÄúFirst Valentine‚Äôs Day with you as my wife. I love you,‚Äù the musician gushes in the caption.

January 22, 2023

Travis debuts a new tattoo of Kourt‚Äôs eyes on his upper thigh (gonna have to swipe through to see it):

October 17, 2022

Kravis are caught celebrating their anniversary (and re-creating Travis‚Äôs proposal!) by Rebel Wilson, lol:

October 10, 2022

Kravis kick off their favorite season (spooky, obviously) by celebrating Travis‚Äôs son Landon Barker‚Äôs birthday in full black tie:

September 11, 2022

Kravis attend the Tommy Hilfiger show looking all kinds of in love.

August 25, 2022

Kourt and Travis show up at Kylie Jenner‚Äôs party for Kylie Cosmetics x Ulta Beauty, and they‚Äôre obviously hand in hand (can never! not be! touching!):

August 13, 2022

Travis goes on tour following his health scare, and Kourtney is right by his side. Also, they‚Äôre just as horny as ever.

July 8, 2022

A source tells E! News that Travis is back at home and ‚Äúfeeling much better‚Äù and that ‚ÄúKourtney took action immediately when he was in pain, and he‚Äôs really thankful. It was definitely an eye-opening experience for the whole family, and they are all rallying around Travis.‚Äù

The source also notes that Travis‚Äôs hospitalization was ‚Äúreally emotional and scary‚Äù for Kourt and that Travis is ‚Äúforever grateful for her being by his side.‚Äù

July 2, 2022

Following news of Travis‚Äôs hospitalization on June 29, he and Kourtney release statements thanking fans for their support and explaining that Travis was suffering from ‚Äúlife-threatening pancreatitis.‚Äù

‚ÄúOh, what a scary and emotional week it has been,‚Äù Kourtney said in her statement. ‚ÄúOur health is everything and sometimes we take for granted how quickly it can change. Travis and I went in for a routine endoscopy together and he ended up with severe, life-threatening pancreatitis. I am so grateful to God for healing my husband, for all of your prayers for him and for us, for the overwhelming outpouring of love and support. I am so touched and appreciative. I am so thankful to our specialists, doctors, and nurses at Cedars Sinai for taking such wonderful care of my husband and me during our stay.‚Äù

Kourtney also sent a message to paparazzi who sold old photos and tried to pass them off as current during Travis‚Äôs hospitalization. ‚ÄúAnd to the paparazzi who sold pictures of me ‚Äòout and about‚Äô while my husband was in the hospital fighting for his life‚Ä¶these were photos actually taken weeks ago (I can‚Äôt even remember the last time I wore that sweatsuit in the photos)‚Ä¶I didn‚Äôt forget about you,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúA new level of low, monetizing off of our nightmare. Really savagely uncool when I actually didn‚Äôt leave his side‚Ä¶shame on you.‚Äù

June 20, 2022

Kourtney throws Travis a sweet and intimate Father‚Äôs Day party with his kids, and she says ‚ÄúYou deserve the world and more‚Äù when he thanks her on Insta.

May 22, 2022

Kourt goes ahead and changes her name on Insta:

May 22, 2022

Kravis get married 2.0! The couple has an extravagant Italian wedding in Portofino and Kourt wears a stunning veil embroidered with Travis‚Äôs head tattoo:

May 15, 2022

Kravis get married! Again! And this time, it‚Äôs for real. Photos of the couple in a car with ‚ÄúJust Married‚Äù on it drop on TMZ, which reports that Kourt and Trav ‚Äúgot the legal paperwork in order Sunday‚Äîso they are, in fact, married now.‚Äù The outlet also notes that they are ‚Äúhaving an actual wedding ceremony in Italy in the near future.‚Äù Meanwhile, a source tells People, ‚ÄúThey had to legally get married first ahead of their big Italian wedding, which is happening very soon. All the details are set and the whole family, including all the kids, are very excited.‚Äù

May 4, 2022

The Kardashians airs the BTS of Kravis‚Äôs engagement, including Kris Jenner‚Äôs emotional speech at their post-proposal dinner!

May 2, 2022

Kravis make their debut at the Met Gala in matching outfits, no less.

And yes, there‚Äôs PDA:

April 17, 2022

Travis tells a follower trolling him that he, ahem, ‚Äústill got the finger up the ass, and my intestines, were totally nude and full PDA with my fianc√©e.‚Äù Kay!

April 6, 2022

Kourt shuts down Jimmy Kimmel when he calls her ‚Äúfake married,‚Äù saying, ‚ÄúWell, it‚Äôs not called fake married. There was no, like, possibility to get a marriage license at that hour,‚Äù explaining that she tried her best to get one. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm like, ‚ÄòAre you guys lying?‚Äô We asked, like, five times, ‚ÄòWhat do we have to do to make this happen?‚Äô It was 2 a.m. and they were like, ‚ÄòIt opens at 8 o‚Äôclock.‚Äô‚Äù

April 5, 2022

News breaks that KRAVIS ARE MARRIED! The couple tied the knot on Grammys night in Las Vegas, and their wedding was officiated by an Elvis impersonator. Like‚Ä¶truly iconic.

April 3, 2022

Kravis make a surprise appearance at the Grammy Awards, and this was the vibe:

March 27, 2022

Kourtney and Travis hit the Oscars! And make out on the red carpet, as ya do.

March 14, 2022

On March 14, Hulu dropped a trailer for the Kardashians‚Äô new reality show and it included some major Kravis news: They want to grow their blended family.

‚ÄúTravis and I want to have a baby,‚Äù Kourtney says in the trailer, which includes a scene showing the couple at a doctor‚Äôs office being asked for a sample (!!!).

March 10, 2022

Being engaged and *almost* married has not done anything to cool off Kourtney and Travis‚Äôs red-hot PDA. Case in point: In early March, TMZ published pics of a very steamy and *very* public make-out sesh Kourt and Travis enjoyed (whilst rolling around in the sand, no less) in Laguna Beach, California. The PDA was so intense, in fact, that a family that was also hanging out on the beach at the time actually reportedly asked them to cool it (which Kourtney and Travis did‚Äîby hopping in the ocean to continue enjoying their love bubble).

The next day, Kourtney posted pictures and video from the outing on Instagram that confirmed just how horny they were for each other during the beach day:

February 18, 2022

By late February, reports were circulating that Kourtney and Travis were *considering* growing their family. Neither Kourtney nor Travis has talked about having more kids together publicly, but a source close to the pair told Entertainment Tonight that they are ‚Äúopen to the idea of having children together and growing their family‚Äù and that ‚Äútheir families are both supportive of it too and just want them to be happy.‚Äù

February 14, 2022

Travis went all out for Valentine‚Äôs Day, surprising Kourtney with a giant statue of Mickey and Minnie gazing at each other with love, surrounded by ALL THE ROSES.

January 2022

As 2022 kicked off, Kravis insiders started teasing details of the couple‚Äôs wedding planning process, including the fact that they planned to keep the event small and intimate and that they were eyeing spring dates for the big day.

December 18, 2021

Over the holidays, Travis and Kourtney took a blended family trip to Disneyland with two of their sons, Landon and Reign.

November 14, 2021

Kourtney and Travis took their love to the chapel‚Äîfor Simon Huck and Phil Riportella‚Äôs wedding. But still.

October 31, 2021

Travis and Kourtney revealed their True Romance Halloween costumes on Instagram‚Äîwhich caused a bit of drama with Travis‚Äôs ex Shanna Moakler. When a fan commented to Shanna that it was ‚Äúodd‚Äù that Kravis were bonding over the movie that was ‚Äúyour and his thing when you were married,‚Äù Shanna replied, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs like an episode of Punk‚Äôd. üòÇ‚Äù

The next day, Kourtney shared pics of her and Travis in their second Halloween couples costume‚Äîa perfect recreation of Winona Ryder‚Äôs and Johnny Depp‚Äôs characters in Edward Scissorhands.

October 17, 2021

Travis and Kourtney are engaged! Travis proposed in Montecito on the beach and‚Äîduh‚ÄîKourtney said yes. Pics or it didn‚Äôt happen? Here ya go:

September 12, 2021

Amid all the Scott-Younes drama, Kourtney and Travis make their first public appearance as a couple at the 2021 MTV VMAs‚Äîwhere Travis performed with Machine Gun Kelly.

Their vibe on the carpet? What do you think?!

August 31, 2021

Kourtney‚Äôs ex Younes Bendjima leaks a DM he got from Scott Disick, in which Scott called out Kravis‚Äôs PDA, saying, ‚ÄúYo is this chick ok!???? Broooo like what is this. In the middle of Italy.‚Äù

Not a great look, and apparently, Kourtney was unimpressed.

August 29, 2021

Travis and Kourtney head to Italy and spend most of their time being adorable and making out:

August 17, 2021

Travis reveals that he and Kourtney have taken their first flight together as a couple. This marks Travis‚Äôs first time on a plane since surviving a crash in 2008, which tragically killed his security guard, Charles Still, his assistant, Chris Baker, and the plane‚Äôs two pilots.

July 15, 2021

Fans briefly spiral thinking Kourtney and Travis got engaged in Vegas thanks to THIS POST and some evidence you can read about right this way:

July 10, 2021

Kourtney and Travis fully make out on camera at the UFC 264 match. It‚Äôs a lot!

June 21, 2021

Kravis spend a cute lil beach weekend with their families:

June 19, 2021

Kourtney and Travis make out in the studio with MGK lurking in the background:

June 9, 2021

Kourt‚Äôs on the fence about getting engaged right now, but the good news? It‚Äôs ‚Äúlikely‚Äù a possibility, a source detailed to Entertainment Tonight.

ET‚Äôs source says, ‚ÄúKourtney and Travis really recognize now more than ever how special their relationship is and how fortunate they are to spend their time together whether it‚Äôs just the two of them, with friends, or with their families. They could also definitely see themselves ending up together one day and it‚Äôs really whatever makes Kourtney happy.‚Äù More than anything, they‚Äôre ‚Äújust living in the moment and enjoying each day.‚Äù

And even better news: ‚ÄúBuilding a future together in a more permanent respect could likely happen,‚Äù that source adds.

June 8, 2021

Kourtney casually posts a vial of Travis‚Äôs blood on Instagram. Yes, it‚Äôs a little disturbing!

May 13, 2021

More engagement updates about Kourtney and Travis start rolling in‚Äîand it turns out that it‚Äôs a little more complicated than Travis just popping the question.

A source tells Entertainment Tonight that ‚Äúgetting engaged and married one day has definitely been a topic of conversation between Kourtney and Travis. Travis would absolutely love to tie the knot with Kourtney, but Kourtney hasn‚Äôt been sure that‚Äôs the step she wants to take in their relationship right now. She is extraordinarily happy and doesn‚Äôt feel the need or want the pressure of getting married.‚Äù

Per ET‚Äôs source, Kourtney‚Äôs a little hesitant because ‚Äúthere are a lot of other factors that concern her‚Äù if she and Travis marry, ‚Äúone of them being Scott [Disick] and, more importantly, her kids and what that adjustment would mean for them. It could be a lot to process, even though everyone sees that Kourtney is undeniably in love with Travis. Kourtney sees herself loving this moment and is just taking everything one day at a time and enjoying their time together.‚Äù

The source does make a point to say that Kourt‚Äôs hesitation has nothing to do with how she actually feels about Travis. For the record, ‚ÄúTravis makes Kourtney laugh uncontrollably and she loves that he always brings a smile to her face. She also really loves that Travis is such a great, hands-on dad. Travis loves that Kourtney has such an entrepreneurial spirit and that she is a strong, independent mom. They feel like they‚Äôre the perfect match.‚Äù

As for how things are going between Kourt and Scott? Yeah‚Ä¶an E! News source says, ‚ÄúScott and Kourtney have a tense relationship right now primarily because he‚Äôs been focusing on his new life in Miami and because of Kourtney getting serious with Travis. They are barely speaking. It‚Äôs hard for him to see Kourtney in love with someone else.‚Äù

May 12, 2021

How are the Kardashians reacting to Kourtney and Travis‚Äôs love parade, you ask? Welp, ‚ÄúKourtney‚Äôs family is happy for her, but they‚Äôre also in a little bit of shock because they‚Äôve never seen her like this before,‚Äù according to Entertainment Tonight. Honestly? Same!

And it doesn‚Äôt seem like the two have plans to stop anytime either. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre so in love and constantly fawning over one another,‚Äù ET‚Äôs source says. ‚ÄúThey have such a strong connection and can‚Äôt get enough of each other.‚Äù

‚ÄúTravis makes Kourtney feel so special and he is always showing her how much he loves her and how important she is to him,‚Äù the source continues. ‚ÄúKourtney has been extremely loving toward him as well and has also been making a big effort to show how much she cares.‚Äù

Speaking of loving, Kourt actually tattoos the words ‚ÄúI love you‚Äù on Travis‚Äôs arm. You know, just in case he wasn‚Äôt 100 percent sure:

May 5, 2021

Welp, don‚Äôt be surprised if Kourt and Trav start sporting bling on that finger soon, because a source tells Entertainment Tonight that ‚ÄúKourtney and Travis are in love and have talked about their future and the possibility of getting engaged and married. Kourtney hasn‚Äôt felt this strongly about anyone in a while and can see a forever with Travis.‚Äù

The fact that their families adore each other also helps a possible marriage along quite nicely. ‚ÄúAlthough the couple hasn‚Äôt been together for a while, they‚Äôve known each other for years and have a strong connection,‚Äù the source continues. ‚ÄúKourtney‚Äôs family hasn‚Äôt seen her this happy in a while and they love Travis. The couple‚Äôs kids get along great and that has made things much easier for them.‚Äù

April 27, 2021

Kourtney and Travis go on vacation YET AGAIN (seriously, does the concept of a pandemic even exist to them?), this time to Utah‚Äôs Amangiri resort in Canyon Point. To mark the occasion, Kourt posts a pic of her and Travis engaging in their raunchiest PDA to date:

But wait! That‚Äôs not all‚ÄîTravis is also overcome with the vacation feels and raises Kourt‚Äôs already raunchy post with a photo set with snaps and video from their stay, which just so happens to include Travis casually resting his hand on Kourtney‚Äôs butt:

April 18, 2021

It‚Äôs Kourtney‚Äôs birthday!!! And truly no one‚Äôs Instagram feed is safe because Travis posts the sappiest b-day tribute to her‚Äîa picture set that casually happens to include a video of Kourt sucking on his actual thumb (can‚Äôt believe I had to type that, wow). Yes, really:

And since Travis just loves spoiling his best girl, he also got Kourt a massive flower bouquet of gardenias and tulips‚ÄîI‚Äôm jelly!

‚ÄúTravis often spoils her and he gave her the most amazing, beautiful flower arrangement for her birthday,‚Äù a source tells People of the gift. ‚ÄúThey are celebrating with her family today.‚Äù

‚ÄúKourtney still seems very happy with Travis. He is very into her,‚Äù the source adds. ‚ÄúHe constantly gives her compliments and attention. You can tell he is thrilled to be dating her. Kourtney is soaking it all up and enjoying life.‚Äù Cool, guess engagement is imminent!

April 11, 2021

Aaaaand Travis and Kourtney are back at it again with the thirsty Instagrams! Trav posts a photo of himself playing drums with the caption, ‚ÄúAll day I dream about sex w/ you.‚Äù And then actually tags Kourtney in the photo. Discreet? They‚Äôve never heard of it.

April 9, 2021

And we have yet another big relationship milestone happening, this time courtesy of Travis! Travis is spotted on the set of a new music video with Kourtney‚Äôs name tattooed over his heart (or his left nipple, if ya wanna be more technical)‚Äîyou can take a look at the ~masterpiece~ here.

Meanwhile, Kourtney and Travis are being hella horny on Instagram. Kourt posts a very üëÄ photo with the caption, ‚ÄúWatchin‚Äô movies, but we ain‚Äôt seen a thing tonight.‚Äù Aka lyrics from Ariana Grande‚Äôs sexually charged bop ‚Äú34+35.‚Äù

Then Travis posts this in response:

I‚Äôd tell these two to get a room, but looks like they already have!

April 3, 2021

Biiig relationship milestone here‚ÄîTravis and Kourtney take a trip to Utah to go snowboarding‚Ä¶and their entire family tags along with them! Peep the pics below:

Fans then learn that Travis‚Äôs and Kourtney‚Äôs kids are with them when Alabama Barker (Travis‚Äôs 15-year-old daughter) posts a ‚ÄúPass the Phone‚Äù TikTok challenge video featuring her older sister and brother, Atiana De La Hoya and Landon Barker, as well as Penelope, Mason, and Reign Disick.

March 29, 2021

Pandemic be damned! Travis and Kourtney attend a UFC game in Las Vegas and are seen in the VIP section engaging in some very‚Ä¶interesting PDA‚ÄîTravis is seen sucking Kourtney‚Äôs finger in a video from Shane Handler‚Äôs Instagram Stories‚Äîwhich podcaster Amanda Hirsch later shares on her @NotSkinnyButNotFat Insta:

What is even happening.

March 22, 2021

Travis and Kourt have evolved to the stage in the relationship where they‚Äôre exchanging ‚ÄúI love you‚Äùs. Kourtney writes a handwritten note to Travis with these three special words, which he later posts to his Instagram Stories.

March 2, 2021

An Entertainment Tonight source gets Scott Disick‚Äôs POV on how he‚Äôs feeling about Kourtney and Travis‚Äôs relationship. In short: Scott is chilling and doesn‚Äôt think Kourtney will be pushing him out of her life anytime soon.

‚ÄúScott knows he always has a special place in Kourtney‚Äôs heart and that he can‚Äôt ever be replaced and will always be in the picture since he‚Äôs the father of their children,‚Äù the source says. ‚ÄúHe isn‚Äôt threatened by Kourtney and Travis‚Äôs relationship at this point.‚Äù

February 20, 2021

Trav and Kourt are taking a page from the Megan Fox and Machine Gun Kelly book of romance by engaging in some serious twin flame lingo. Travis posts a note that Kourtney left him to his Instagram Stories, which reads, ‚ÄúTo lots of fun adventures. May we destroy each other completely. Love, Kourtney.‚Äù

Sounds familiar? It should, because a few days earlier, Travis posted this to his Twitter:

February 17, 2021

Kourtney and Travis take the next major step in their relationship‚Äîgoing Instagram official, duh! Kourtney posts a pic of her holding Travis‚Äôs hand to her feed, and Travis signals his love/approval with a lil black heart emoji in the comments.

February 14, 2021

Since COVID-19 is still very much a thing, Travis and Kourtney keep their Valentine‚Äôs Day celebrations low-key and likely spend the evening together cuddled up by a romantic outdoor fireplace, which Kourtney posts to her Instagram Stories.

February 10, 2021

Kourtney and Travis go out for dinner in Los Angeles, and they pack on the cutest PDA. Lucky for us, an E! News source dishes all the adorable details of their outing.
